page.title: 16CHILDREN GAMES - PATCHWAY E
page.content: 1.{Bulldog} This is a game for any number of players. You need quite a lot of space. One person stands in the middle facing the others. When he shouts "Bulldog",everyone tries to run to the other side. The person in the middle has to catch them. If you are caught, then you must help catch the rest. When everyone has been caught,the person who was caught first is in the middle,and you start a new game. 2.{French skipping } This is for 3 or more players. Rope or wool is tied around 2 people standing 2 metres apart.The others jump,one at a time: in, out, in, ON, in, out, turn around, in and out. If you stand on the rope you are out and another person has a go.
